add_parent_folder_dependency.description:
Whether to automatically add dependency on parent folder.
        Only applicable if 'parent_type' is folder. Defaults to false.
        If the parent folder is created in the same config as this project then
        this field should be set to true to create a dependency and pass the
        folder id once it has been created.

deployments.description:
Map of deployment name to resources config.
        Each key will be a directory in the output path.
        For resource schema see ./resources.hcl.

parent_id.description: ID of parent GCP resource to apply the policy: can be one of the organization ID or folder ID according to parent_type.

parent_type.description: Type of parent GCP resource to apply the policy: can be one of 'organization' or 'folder'.

apis.description: APIs to enable in the project.

is_shared_vpc_host.description: Whether this project is a shared VPC host. Defaults to 'false'.

shared_vpc_attachment.description: If set, treats this project as a shared VPC service project.

host_project_id.description: ID of host project to connect this project to.

subnets.description: Subnets within the host project to grant this project access to.

terraform_addons.description:
Additional Terraform configuration for the project deployment.
            For schema see ./deployment.hcl.
